name: The Inside Job
description:
Updated v0.0.2: Added a view for the Graphics Card Fan when fixed.

It's already HELL to have your graphics card broken, now you want me to fix it!?!

This is a simple game to fix your Graphics Card instead of buying a new one!

Its very easy I tell you!

Go to the YELLOW Entrance (USB port) to end the game.

All assets are created by me. Early Access of Game Assets available here at itch.io:  https://bit.ly/3oRnTKa

Submitted to Game Jam : Mini jam #69 (Made in two days in this 3-day game jam. Cuz thats life)
